name: Galoot
description:
In this game you play a cat in a dystopic world without colours. Your task is to find the magic yarn balls and restore the order.

Instructions:

You move around by clicking on the map. There are NPCs and items on the map which you need to interact with in order to reach new areas.

The game source can be found on github:

https://github.com/sharyari/galoot

it can be played on itch.io or on github

https://sharyari.github.io/galoot/

Made by:

Kristofer Nordin, Sara Liljefors, Jonathan Sharyari, Rezvaneh Faraji
